page.title: 10Business Premises & Exports
page.content: Approximately 558 of the businesses are local firms.808 of the companies which replied to the questionnaire have been in the area for over 10 years.Over half moved into new premises,the manufacturers going mainly to the new Birches Industrial Estate.Other firms moved into existing premises which included a Blacksmith,a convent,the Southern Railway Stables and the house of Sir Robert MacAlpine. The goods or services provided by all except three companies were for the home market,but the value of the exports which included scientific instruments,computers,and electronic machinery,of those 3 exceptions amounted to billions of pounds.
